General.Name: Prashkovsky
General.Description: Prashkovsky Investments and Construction Ltd. develops, constructs, and sells properties in Israel and the United States. It constructs residential, commercial, industrial, and office spaces. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Rehovot, Israel.
